inputs.name: Affine file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of file containing affine transform.

inputs.name: Apply inmask
inputs.description: A list of items which are 0 or 1. List of iterations to use input mask on (1 to use, 0 to skip).

inputs.name: Apply intensity mapping
inputs.description: A list of items which are 0 or 1. List of subsampling levels to apply intensity mapping for (0 to skip, 1 to apply).

inputs.name: Apply refmask
inputs.description: A list of items which are 0 or 1. List of iterations to use reference mask on (1 to use, 0 to skip).

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Bias regularization lambda
inputs.description: A float. Weight of regularisation for bias-field, default 10000.

inputs.name: Biasfield resolution
inputs.description: A tuple of the form: (an integer (int or long), an integer (int or long), an integer (int or long)). Resolution (in mm) of bias-field modelling local intensities, default 50, 50, 50.

inputs.name: Config file
inputs.description: 't1_2_mni152_2mm' or 'fa_2_fmrib58_1mm' or an existing file name. Name of config file specifying command line arguments.

inputs.name: Derive from ref
inputs.description: A boolean. If true, ref image is used to calculate derivatives. default false.

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a value of type 'str' and with values which are a value of type 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Field file
inputs.description: A boolean or a file name. Name of output file with field or true.

inputs.name: Fieldcoeff file
inputs.description: A boolean or a file name. Name of output file with field coefficients or true.

inputs.name: Hessian precision
inputs.description: 'double' or 'float'. Precision for representing hessian, double or float. default double.

inputs.name: Ignore exception
inputs.description: A boolean. Print an error message instead of throwing an exception in case the interface fails to run.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of input image.

inputs.name: In fwhm
inputs.description: A list of items which are an integer (int or long). Fwhm (in mm) of gaussian smoothing kernel for input volume, default [6, 4, 2, 2].

inputs.name: In intensitymap file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of file/files containing initial intensity mapingusually generated by previos fnirt run.

inputs.name: Inmask file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of file with mask in input image space.

inputs.name: Inmask val
inputs.description: A float. Value to mask out in --in image. default =0.0.

inputs.name: Intensity mapping model
inputs.description: 'none' or 'global_linear' or 'global_non_linearlocal_linear' or 'global_non_linear_with_bias' or 'local_non_linear'. Model for intensity-mapping.

inputs.name: Intensity mapping order
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Order of poynomial for mapping intensities, default 5.

inputs.name: Inwarp file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of file containing initial non-linear warps.

inputs.name: Jacobian file
inputs.description: A boolean or a file name. Name of file for writing out the jacobianof the field (for diagnostic or vbm purposes).

inputs.name: Jacobian range
inputs.description: A tuple of the form: (a float, a float). Allowed range of jacobian determinants, default 0.01, 100.0.

inputs.name: Log file
inputs.description: A file name. Name of log-file.

inputs.name: Max nonlin iter
inputs.description: A list of items which are an integer (int or long). Max # of non-linear iterations list, default [5, 5, 5, 5].

inputs.name: Modulatedref file
inputs.description: A boolean or a file name. Name of file for writing out intensity modulated--ref (for diagnostic purposes).

inputs.name: Out intensitymap file
inputs.description: A boolean or a file name. Name of files for writing information pertaining to intensity mapping.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_pair_gz' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Ref file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of reference image.

inputs.name: Ref fwhm
inputs.description: A list of items which are an integer (int or long). Fwhm (in mm) of gaussian smoothing kernel for ref volume, default [4, 2, 0, 0].

inputs.name: Refmask file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Name of file with mask in reference space.

inputs.name: Refmask val
inputs.description: A float. Value to mask out in --ref image. default =0.0.

inputs.name: Regularization lambda
inputs.description: A list of items which are a float. Weight of regularisation, default depending on --ssqlambda and --regmod switches. see user documetation.

inputs.name: Regularization model
inputs.description: 'membrane_energy' or 'bending_energy'. Model for regularisation of warp-field [membrane_energy bending_energy], default bending_energy.

inputs.name: Skip implicit in masking
inputs.description: A boolean. Skip implicit masking  based on valuein --in image. default = 0.

inputs.name: Skip implicit ref masking
inputs.description: A boolean. Skip implicit masking  based on valuein --ref image. default = 0.

inputs.name: Skip inmask
inputs.description: A boolean. Skip specified inmask if set, default false.

inputs.name: Skip intensity mapping
inputs.description: A boolean. Skip estimate intensity-mapping default false.

inputs.name: Skip lambda ssq
inputs.description: A boolean. If true, lambda is not weighted by current ssq, default false.

inputs.name: Skip refmask
inputs.description: A boolean. Skip specified refmask if set, default false.

inputs.name: Spline order
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Order of spline, 2->qadratic spline, 3->cubic spline. default=3.

inputs.name: Subsampling scheme
inputs.description: A list of items which are an integer (int or long). Sub-sampling scheme, list, default [4, 2, 1, 1].

inputs.name: Terminal output
inputs.description: 'stream' or 'allatonce' or 'file' or 'none'. Control terminal output: `stream` - displays to terminal immediately (default), `allatonce` - waits till command is finished to display output, `file` - writes output to file, `none` - output is ignored.

inputs.name: Warp resolution
inputs.description: A tuple of the form: (an integer (int or long), an integer (int or long), an integer (int or long)). (approximate) resolution (in mm) of warp basis in x-, y- and z-direction, default 10, 10, 10.

inputs.name: Warped file
inputs.description: A file name. Name of output image.

name: FNIRT
description: FNIRT, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: FNIRT).
